Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 42nd overall pick, by Coney Island in 1954...
Injured on 6/6/1954 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/4/1956 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/20/1959 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...

Injured on 8/16/1963 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...

Injured on 5/29/1964 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/28/1965 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 8/11/1965 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/4/1966 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 7/18/1966 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drafted in 3rd round, 50th overall pick, by Longport in 1967...
Injured on 8/13/1968 with a Strained Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Longport to Boston (FBA) on 3/2/1970 (Going to SHP: CF E. Bensen. Going to LP: P H. Herman)...
Injured on 7/21/1970 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/1971, off John Fletcher (NJ)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1971, off Gabriel Vargas (MAN)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Plum Grove on 8/22/1971...
Injured on 9/14/1971 with a Inflamed Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Columbus on 10/13/1975...
Injured on 7/31/1977 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1977...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Northeastern on 5/11/1978...
Won World Championship with Boston (FBA) in 1980...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against New Jersey on 4/9/1982...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1982, hitting .542 with 1 HR, 3 RBI...
